function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Enhanced public interest in sustainability and community action","Impact":"Increased public engagement with conservation and sustainability efforts","Mitigation":"Develop targeted educational campaigns to ensure accurate and science-based information is disseminated","Technologies":"Social media, educational platforms","People":"Public, community organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Opportunities for health and well-being in nature","Impact":"Potential increase in human activities in natural areas, leading to potential environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Implement guidelines for responsible and sustainable outdoor activities, enforce protected area regulations","Technologies":"Geospatial monitoring, remote sensing","People":"Outdoor enthusiasts, conservation organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"One Health approach in Guinea-Bissau and Indonesia","Impact":"Increased awareness of the interconnectedness of ecosystems, animal, and human health","Mitigation":"Strengthen veterinary public health systems, promote sustainable land use practices","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, GIS mapping","People":"Local communities, health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
